typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pref as (name as string, surname as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> cosmosdbdataset
cosmosdbdataset derive(hashedName = sha2(256,lower(id))) ~> derivedCol
derivedCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gamLayer as string,
		recentContries as (countryId as string, lastAccessDate as string)[],
		preference as (localeFileName as string, defaultChannelId as string, defaultCountryId as string, defaultLanguageId as string, browseViewId as string, dateViewId as string, fontViewId as string, isWelcomeWanted as boolean, isPrintAcknowledged as boolean)[],
		lastLoginDate as string,
		isActive as boolean,
		createDate as string,
		modifyDate as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		pref,
		id = hashedName
	)) ~> sink1
